# Costa Rica Billie Jean King Cup team

The Costa Rica Billie Jean King Cup team represents Costa Rica in Billie Jean King Cup tennis competition and are governed by the Federaci√≥n Costarricense de Tenis. They have not competed since 2018.
History
Costa Rica competed in its first Fed Cup in 1992.  Their best result was finishing fourth in Group II in 2001.
See also
*
External links
*
The first time they played a game was in 1992.
They have played 15 years in a row.
